comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Justice James W. Gerard of the New York Supreme Court According to NYT of June 27, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9E06E2DF163DE633A... "It is learned here that President Wilson has formally submitted the name of Justice Gerard of the New York Supreme Court to the German Government as Ambassador to Berlin, and the appointment is under formal consideration here[Berlin]." See www.absoluteastronomy.com/topics/James_W._Gerard#encyclop... for a bio

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks to you both.  We'll fill in the name next time we update this record.
